        Sets all the messages in the network

      • setOpen

        public void setOpen(boolean open)
        Sets the network open or closed, if the network is closed and no messages are moving, then the simulation is done.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Returns whether or not the network is forced open. Meaning that there are no messages moving but it is still accepting new messages.
